body_html:
@colesbury i disagree. Modules should be able to be reused at will. Taking away that flexibility doesn't seem like a good solution, and I dont see any user-errors from keeping it.
Just making the iterator return unique variables seems reasonable.

body:
@colesbury i disagree. Modules should be able to be reused at will. Taking away that flexibility doesn't seem like a good solution, and I dont see any user-errors from keeping it.
Just making the iterator return unique variables seems reasonable.
